medical_history.chief_complaint: Excessive daytime sleepiness, fainting spells, and dream mentations.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began about 7-8 years ago with difficulty falling asleep and maintaining sleep. She had vivid dreams, snoring, and episodes of dizziness and feeling faint, which were exacerbated by emotions. Daytime somnolence was notable, marked by frequent naps.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) diagnosed at age 6; history of absence seizures from age 2-8 years, treated with valproic acid, with 9 years seizure-free and medication-free at presentation.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of sleepwalking and sleep-talking in her mother, younger brother, and maternal uncle; maternal uncle had restless legs syndrome. No reported family history of seizures or excessive sleepiness.
